data.title: Frances Lennon OBITUARY
data.meta_description: Frances Lennon   Beloved mother, sister, aunt & grand- mother, passed away peacefully, June 14th, 2013. She was a devoted mother of 7. She possessed unc
data.text: Frances Lennon Beloved mother, sister, aunt & grand- mother, passed away peacefully, June 14th, 2013. She was a devoted mother of 7. She possessed uncommon wisdom, grace and dignity. She had a larger than life personality and was a joy to be around. She will live on, in memory, until we all meet again. She is survived by her 7 children: Kathy Pruitt, Laura Post, Rick Lennon & wife Sandra, Gary Lennon & wife Bea, Margaret (Ann) Lennon, John Lennon & wife Marie, Harvey Lennon & beloved, “adopted” sons Mike Gomez and John (Camel) Villareal. Sisters: Evelyn Goldsmith, Nini Trias & Judy Caro. Grandchildren: Sandra “Nikki” Lennon, MIchael, Alea, Daniel, Vincent, Raymond, John Jr., Carolyn, & Marcia. Great-grandchildren: Aubrey, Raymond, Angelina, Michaela, Brandon, numerous nieces and nephews. Services will be held at Montecito Memorial Park (3520 E.Washington St., Colton) Our Lady Queen of Peace Chapel, on Friday, June 28th @ 10AM.
